direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return a list representation of the queue, but asOrderedList sorts the list before returning it.
The add method modifies the queue, which is used by asOrderedList to generate the ordered list.
Both asOrderedList and Collections.sort use a comparator to sort a list, sharing similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods access the internal queue to convert its contents into a different form (list or array).
